body: Your ascension is complete; you have the spell resistance approaching that of a demon.
name: Noble Spell Resistance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Drow/New Racial Rules/Drow Feats/Noble Spell Resistance

sections.body: Cha 13, Wis 13, Greater Drow Nobility, character level 13th, drow.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Your spell resistance is equal to 11 + your character level.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You receive a +1 circumstance bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks made against any drow.
sections.name: Special
